title: I'm looking for a font I saw on a shirt...
content:
This was on the back of a girls sweatshirt in a video (Hit the Lights - Bodybag) I’ve been looking for it everywhere but I have NO luck! Attached are three pictures of the font (Yes, I know one of them is upside down -\_- ) Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gooniesneversay.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171146/http:/typophile.com/files/gooniesneversay.png) | 78.38 KB |
| [goonies.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171146/http:/typophile.com/files/goonies.png) | 16.15 KB |
| [bodybag3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171146/http:/typophile.com/files/bodybag3.png) | 57.21 KB |

 [‹ Anybody know this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171146/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41863 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anybody know this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171146/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41862 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alibee4

comments.content:
I think it looks like Berthold Block.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you so much! I was starting to lean towards Alinea Sans Medium, but Block Berthold is so much better. Do you know any similar fonts?

[Berliner Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015171146/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=berliner) is probably about the closest you can get to Block without being Block.

- Lex
